ARABIC: ٱلَّتِى لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى ٱلْبِلَٰدِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: whose like was not created in any land -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The like of whom were never created in the realm;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: the like of whom no nation was ever created in the lands of the world?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: whose like has never been created in any other land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Like whom no one else was born in the cities.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The like of which were not created in the land
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The like of which were not created in the (other) cities;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: the like of which was never created in the land,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The like of which was not created in the lands;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: the like of which has never been created in the land,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The like of which was not built in the cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: the like of which was not created among cities,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The like of which were not produced in (all) the land?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The like of which were not created in the land?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the like of which was never created in the countries?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The like of which was never created in the land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:8] the like of which was not created in the land, in terms of their power of assault and strength,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The like of which was not created in the lands) the like of their strength and height were not created in the land; it is also said that Iram is the name of a town built by Shadid and Shaddad whose columns were of gold and silver and the like of its beauty was not created in the land;
